statement.p: In the model \displaystyle{A}={179.2}{e}^{{{0.0496}{t}}} what is the percent increase or decrease?
Note all numbers are scientific measurements.

solution.p: The percent increase/decrease is calculated from \displaystyle{e}^{{0.0496}}\approx{1.0508506720279}. Because this is bigger than 1, this is a percent increase and the result is \displaystyle{1.0508506720279}-{1}={0.050850672027949}\approx{0.0509} and the percent is 5.09.
We round to 3 significant digits because the measurement (exponent) had 3 significant digits.
